cz.ive.location
Interface Area

All Superinterfaces:
Hook, IveId, IveObject, WayPoint
All Known Subinterfaces:
GraphArea, GridArea
All Known Implementing Classes:
Area2DGrid, CommonArea, SimpleArea
public interface Area
extends WayPoint

Interface describing an Area. This is basicly a WayPoint that can expand into net of WayPoints with bigger LOD.

Author:
ondra

getWayPoints

Getter for WayPoints that this area consists of.

Returns:
WayPoint expansion on higher LOD

getWayPoints

java.util.List<WayPoint> getWayPoints(Kind kind)
Getter for WayPoints contained in this area and matching the given kind.

Parameters:
kind - Kind to search for
Returns:
WayPoints with the kind match

getBorderWayPoints

java.util.List<WayPoint> getBorderWayPoints(WayPoint neighbour)
Getter for WayPoints that are behind the border in the Area specified by a possibly empty WayPoint (with at least valid id).

Parameters:
neighbour - WayPoint representing an adjacent Area
Returns:
array of possibly empty WayPoint that are situated in the Area represented by neighbour parameter and that are accessible in a single step.

defineObjectPlace

void defineObjectPlace(ObjectClass objClass,
                       WayPoint place)
Defines a WayPoint, on which will be placed objects of the given class id when expanding. On that place will be placed each object, whose class id is equal to the given id, or is a child and no more specific place was found. In case of more places for one object, a random one will be chosen.

Parameters:
objClass - Class of objects, which should be placed there
place - WayPoint to place the objects

undefineObjectPlace

void undefineObjectPlace(ObjectClass objClass,
                         WayPoint place)
Undefines object place for the given class id. Reverse action of defineObjectPlace().

Parameters:
objClass - Class to remove the place from
place - Place to undefine

undefineObjectPlace

void undefineObjectPlace(ObjectClass objClass)
Undefines all object places for the given class id. Reverse action of defineObjectPlace().

Parameters:
objClass - Class to undefine

clearObjectPlaces

void clearObjectPlaces()
Clears all defined object places.

findObjectPlace

WayPoint findObjectPlace(IveObject object)
Finds object place for the given object among childs. Considers object's class, kind and substantiality.

Parameters:
object - Object to find place for
Returns:
WayPoint Place for the object, null if no WayPoint found

expand

void expand()
            throws NoObjectPlaceException
Expands the area. Places all objects placed in the area (existing or not, valid or not) to some contained WayPoint when expanding. The most specific class id on the way from each object's class id to the class root will be found in the object places set defined by defineObjectPlace and the object will be placed there. If no entry is found for the object, the NoObjectPlaceException will be thrown. Informs the interpreter.

Specified by:
expand in interface WayPoint
Throws:
NoObjectPlaceException

shrink

void shrink()
Shrinks the location. Places all objects from all childs (existing or not, valid or not) to this WayPoint. Informs the interpreter.

Specified by:
shrink in interface WayPoint

setPhantomGenerationInfo

void setPhantomGenerationInfo(CommonArea.PhantomGenerationInfo info)
Sets the info needed to generate phantoms during expand.

Parameters:
info - The phantom generation info

forgetWayPoints

void forgetWayPoints()
Forgets all children - to be used during shrink

registerGuiExpandListener

void registerGuiExpandListener(Listener listener)
Registers new expand listener. This should be used only by u Gui, since the callback is performed in the Swing thread with the Simulation lock locked.

Parameters:
listener - callback to be called when expanding.

registerGuiShrinkListener

void registerGuiShrinkListener(Listener listener)
Registers new shrink listener. This should be used only by u Gui, since the callback is performed in the Swing thread with the Simulation lock locked.

Parameters:
listener - callback to be called when shrinking.

unregisterGuiExpandListener

void unregisterGuiExpandListener(Listener listener)
Unregisters expand listener. This should be used only by u Gui, since the callback is performed in the Swing thread with the Simulation lock locked.

Parameters:
listener - callback not to be called anymore.

unregisterGuiShrinkListener

void unregisterGuiShrinkListener(Listener listener)
Unregisters shrink listener. This should be used only by u Gui, since the callback is performed in the Swing thread with the Simulation lock locked.

Parameters:
listener - callback not to be called anymore.
